document_data.name: Broderick Betrayed
document_data.mainbody: e sage [[Beldrune]] claimed he favored the play ''Broderick Betrayed'', once, in a conversation with his fellow [[Tabarast]] during the spring of the {{yearlinkName|761}} while he was working in [[Moonshorn Tower]]. Tabarast then recited part of the play, Beldrune called him out for it, as they had agreed not to talk about the Chosen of Mystra, strongly implying the play was about them.
